author: Juha Haataja
content:
I'm just now pondering the move to the m4/3 system, namely the new Panasonic GX80 with the diminutive 12-35 mm kit lens. But the GX80 is not yet available in shops so I have still time to change my mind. ;-) 

And maybe at some point I get attracted to bokeh as well. Your capture here is quite a demonstration.
